name: Youtube: The Unbeveling
description: YouTube with no circles. YouTube with sharp edges. YouTube how it was always meant to be. YouTube how it was.

About

All of my styles and tweaks are available on userstyles.world!
I abstain from the usage of Stylish and UserStyles as they have a lot of tracking features. I recommend Stylus instead.
I only post larger styles here, since it has a larger audience.

VIEW ALL STYLES HERE

additional_info: Find all info at https://userstyles.world/ I push all major updates here, but every tweak and hotfix is on USW.
